casebody.data:
ROCKEFELLER TECHNOLOGY INVESTMENTS (ASIA) VII
v.
CHANGZHOU SINOTYPE TECHNOLOGY CO. S249923 Supreme Court of California. SEPTEMBER 26, 2018 Votes: Cantil-Sakauye, C.J., Chin, Corrigan, Liu, Cuéllar and Kruger, JJ.

The petition for review is granted. The parties are to brief and argue the following issue: Can private parties contractually agree to legal service of process by methods not expressly authorized by the Hague Convention?
